SourceProxy.name: SerafinReader

Documentation.long_help: Read a serafin file into a vtkUnstructuredGrid.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The SERAFIN reader reads a binary file creating a vtkUnstructuredGrid. The default file extension is .srf for this software.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the SERAFIN reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: BuildVectors
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If True tries to compute vectors from varaibles name (name ending with a space and U/V/W, X/Y/Z, QX/QY/QZ, U0/V0/W0)

ReaderFactory.extensions: slf srf res res3d ser r2d spe
